flawed_nl_solution:
The total ratio representing the 500 cards is 11+9 = <<11+9=24>>24
The fraction of the total ratio that represents the number of cards that Ellis got is 11/24, and since there were 500 cards, Ellis got 11/24*500 = <<11/24*500=1375/6>>1375/6
If there were 500 cards, and Ellis received 1375/6 cards, Orion received 500-1375/6 = <<500-1375/6=1625/6>>1625/6 cards
The number of cards that Ellis received more than Orion is 1375/6-1625/6 = <<1375/6-1625/6=-125/3>>-125/3 cards.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 24. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
